data.name: Two of us
data.detailed_description:
Two of us is the cooperative multi-puzzle game that aim puzzle complete by working together. Shoot the alien come from far galaxy to invade earth! A lot of parts are deployed randomly in spaceship to be the game stage. Player’s goal is to finalize missile by combining their parts like a puzzle,and shoot alien’s battleship!



Do you like cute girl character?? The game that can manipulate these cute characters isn’t so many! Many player should be satisfied with this character design. We intend to update the factor so that bring out the charm of character from now on!
data.about_the_game:
Two of us is the cooperative multi-puzzle game that aim puzzle complete by working together. Shoot the alien come from far galaxy to invade earth! A lot of parts are deployed randomly in spaceship to be the game stage. Player’s goal is to finalize missile by combining their parts like a puzzle,and shoot alien’s battleship!



Do you like cute girl character?? The game that can manipulate these cute characters isn’t so many! Many player should be satisfied with this character design. We intend to update the factor so that bring out the charm of character from now on!
data.short_description: Two of us is two-player multi-puzzle game!! This game's goal is to finalize missile(puzzle) by collecting parts in spaceship,and to shoot alien's battleship.Let's finalize the puzzle efficiently by calling out each other to adjust timing and active communication!!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-8400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 以上
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: １ GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-9700
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 以上
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

developers: 6sense (総合学園ヒューマンアカデミー仙台校)
